paper_title: Typical one-parameter bifurcations of gradient flows with at most six singular points on the 2-sphere with holes
abstract: We describe all possible topological structures of typical one-parameter bifurcations of gradient flows on the 2-sphere with holes in the case that the number of singular point of flows is at most six. To describe structures, we separatrix diagrams of flows. The saddle-node singularity is specified by selecting a separatrix in the diagram of the flow befor the bifurcation and the saddle connection is specified by a separatrix, which conect two saddles.
publication_venue: 17 pages, 19 figures. arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:2303.10929
